channel.description: I am wondering if pcie passthrough or sata controller passthrough to a kicksecure vm would pose any security issues? Planning to install debian 10 and distro morph to kicksecure. Any thoughts?

item.title: Passthrough drive to kvm kicksecure

item.description:
aloe2018:

I am wondering if pcie passthrough or sata controller passthrough to a kicksecure vm would pose any security issues? Planning to install debian 10 and distro morph to kicksecure. Any thoughts?

Yes, passing through devices at a the low level opens you up to firmware compromise.
